rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: Large open space with reception area and waiting zone; includes Vastu aligned entrance with proper sunlight.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living room with natural light from east facing windows; includes a central air-conditioning vent and open concept layout.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living area for family meals; Vastu guidelines ensure auspicious food preparation space with proper drainage.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Efficient kitchen design with modular layout, energy-efficient appliances and natural ventilation from south windows to adhere to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: South facing master bedroom ensuring proper alignment with sunrise; includes attached en-suite bathroom for privacy and security.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Well-ventilated guest room with east or north orientation to ensure positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Servant Quarters
rooms.description: Compact servant's quarters integrated near the kitchen; designed on a tight budget while providing essential amenities.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Dedicated utility area for washing and maintenance; ensures easy access from the main living areas.

openings.description: Interior staircase connecting to upper floors; Vastu compliant with proper placement near the entrance

rooms.name: Additional Bedroom 1
rooms.description: North facing bedroom ensuring calm energy flow and privacy.

rooms.name: Additional Bedroom 2
rooms.description: East or west oriented to maintain balance; provides ample natural light.

rooms.name: Balcony Terrace
rooms.description: Shared balcony terrace for relaxation and social gatherings; designed with privacy screens.

rooms.name: Family Room
rooms.description: Cozy family room integrating elements of both east-west orientations to balance positive energy according to Vastu.

rooms.name: Penthouse Suite
rooms.description: Luxurious penthouse suite with private terrace; designed to maximize views and privacy, aligning with Vastu for prosperity.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Additional guest bedroom with serene north orientation for restful sleep.

rooms.name: Study/Workspace
rooms.description: Functional study area ensuring focus and concentration; placed in a quiet corner.

openings.description: Interior staircase connecting to ground floor; designed with minimalistic style adhering to budget constraints.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: Spacious rooftop terrace designed for relaxation and entertainment; includes landscaped area and water features in line with Vastu principles for harmonious energy.

openings.description: Safe access via a central staircase adhering to safety norms
